name: Tether⁣
description: Tether Simulate is an educational research token designed to replicate stablecoin functionalities within isolated testing environments. Launched as a simulation platform, it operates on BNB Chain , providing researchers and developers with a risk-free ecosystem for studying tokenomics and DeFi mechanisms. It is critical to emphasize that Tether Simulate contains no monetary value, reserve backing, or economic linkage to any live cryptocurrency. The project is exclusively educational and bears no affiliation to Tether (USDT) or any other commercial stablecoin.
